alert.note: Alert for Talbot; Upson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 8:39PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Upson and central Talbot Counties through 915 PM EDT... At 839 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Po Biddy Crossroads, or near Talbotton, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Talbotton, Woodland, Junction City, Pleasant Hill, Baldwinville, Prattsburg, Big Lazer Creek Wma and Po Biddy Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
